name: The Island (EzeLuigi)
description:
A two player local multiplayer game in which you go around collecting the little creatures. Release the little creature in the safe zone to acquire points! The winner is decided when the sun goes down. This was made in 2 months as a student project at New York Film Academy.

*Requires Playstation DualShock controllers.

Rules -

Right Joystick- Move the character around

Left Joystick- Rotate the Camera

Square Button- Punch

Square Button (On Drop Zone)- Drop off the little creatures to gain points

X Button- Jump

Have Fun and Enjoy!
